description: white octagonal plaque; blue floral designs and hunting figure riding animal (serpent?) inside rectangle at center flanked by two gold and tan, rearing unicorns facing each other; animal atop central rectangle in tan and blue; blue text in cartouche in lower quadrant reads, "OPIFER; QVE·PER·ORBEM: DICOR:,"; "1687" in blue at bottom; two holes at top center with wire attached
markings: on bottom, on label: [27D]; on bottom: collector\'s label
title: Armorial plaque
